name: Recipes
description: Markdown recipes that scaffold agents and teams (workspace-local).

autoInstallMissingSkills.label: Auto-install missing skills
autoInstallMissingSkills.help: If enabled, recipes can install missing skills into the workspace skills directory (still confirmation-gated if confirmAutoInstall=true).

confirmAutoInstall.label: Confirm auto-install
confirmAutoInstall.help: If enabled, even auto-install requires an explicit confirmation flag (e.g. --yes) or prompt.

cronInstallation.label: Cron job installation
cronInstallation.help: Controls whether recipe-defined cron jobs are installed during scaffold. off=never, prompt=ask, on=auto-install.
